description: Amendments to planning permission dated 17 December 2018 (RN: 18/04054) for reserved matters pursuant to Condition 2 of outline permission dated 16 November 2018 (RN: 18/04103/OUT) for siting, design and external appearance of the buildings within Phase 3b including details of the areas to be used for each land use and internal layouts (including individual room uses for residential accommodation).  Vehicular and pedestrian accesses to the buildings and the servicing and parking arrangements for Phase 3b, as well as the hard and soft landscaping for Phase 3b where not already approved in detail, NAMELY, provide a temporary screen around the existing temporary plant to match the new cladding in line with acoustic requirements, provide additional bronze coloured anodised aluminium fluted panels on North-East and North- West elevations, update the proposed finish to Satin Deco glazing to the plant room door on the North-East elevation in order to limit visibility and include an extract louvre shown to the existing service hole on North-East elevation.
